column8: Two smart dining rooms offer two different dining experiences at this restaurant: one with chairs at the bar and a conveyer belt of traditional Japanese dishes; the other serving contemporary Japanese cuisine, including the intriguing Omakasetasting menu. Nearly all the wines and sakes on the wine list are also available by the glass.
column9: ['Air conditioning', 'Notable sake list', 'Restaurant offering vegetarian menus', 'Terrace']
